jei.pedestals.tool_linkingtool.descripti: §5 从接收器到发送器的连接
jei.pedestals.tool_linkingtool.interacti: §3 潜行右键单击以选择一个底座。（潜行右键单击以取消选择）
§5 从发送器到接收器的连接
§3 潜行右键单击以选择基座。(潜行右键单击以取消选择）
jei.pedestals.tool_upgradetool.interacti: §3 副手工具和左键单击从基座上删除升级，潜行对空气右键单击以切换工具。
jei.pedestals.tool_filtertool.interactio: §3 副手工具和左键单击要从基座上删除过滤器，潜行对空气右键单击以切换工具。
jei.pedestals.tool_worktool.interaction: §3 副手工具，左键单击要从基座上删除的工作卡，潜行对空气右键单击以切换工具。
jei.pedestals.tool_tagtool.interaction: §3 副手你想要的标签，主手工具右键点击。潜行对空气右键单击以切换工具。
jei.pedestals.tool_toolswapper.interacti: §3 副手工具，左键单击从基座上卸下工具。 潜行对空气右键单击以切换工具。
item.pedestals.tool_devtool: 开发工具（仅限创造模式）
jei.pedestals.tool_devtool.interaction: §3 如果处于创造模式，则使用副手工具和左键单击可断开底座
jei.pedestals.tool_manifesttool.descript: §5 获取有关当前基座的信息。可以用来查看基座有什么。
jei.pedestals.tool_manifesttool.interact: §3 潜行右键单击基座以获取详细信息，右键单击以清除

jei.pedestals.filter_base.interaction: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to Insert the Filter In Pedestal.

jei.pedestals.filter_itemstack.interacti: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES

jei.pedestals.filter_durability.interact: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchanted.descripti: §5 This Filter Filters Enchanted 物品
jei.pedestals.filter_enchanted.interacti: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedcount.desc: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchants on an 物品
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedcount.inte: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedexact.desc: §5 This Filter Filters By Specific Enchants on 物品
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedexact.inte: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedfuzzy.desc: §5 This Filter Filters By Enchant Names on 物品
jei.pedestals.filter_enchantedfuzzy.inte: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_food.description: §5 This Filter Filters out 物品 the Game Considers Food
jei.pedestals.filter_food.interaction: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_mod.description: §5 This Filter Filters By 物品 From the Same Mod
jei.pedestals.filter_mod.interaction: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_restricted.descript: §5 This Filter Restricts How Many 物品 a Pedestal Can Hold
jei.pedestals.filter_restricted.interact: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.filter_tag.description: §5 This Filter Filters By The Tags on an 物品 (物品 in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
jei.pedestals.filter_tag.interaction: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.modifier_getter.descriptio: §5 This Gets Modifiers off 升级 for use when setting up the Modifier Filter(s)
jei.pedestals.modifier_getter.interactio: §3 副手 the 升级 and with this in your main hand, right click.(No item in offhand will cycle the selected tag) While the item in in you main hand, crouch right click to clear all tags.
jei.pedestals.tag_getter.description: §5 This Gets Tags off 物品 and Blocks for use when setting up the Tag Filter
jei.pedestals.tag_getter.interaction: §3 For Blocks: 副手 物品 and 潜行 Right Click to get Tags from a block in-world.(Clicking in the air will instead cycle the selected tag) For 物品: 副手 the item and with this in your main hand, right click.(No item in offhand will cycle the selected tag) While the item in in you main hand, crouch right click to clear all tags.
jei.pedestals.filter_tag_machine.descrip: §5 This Filter Filters By The Tags on an 物品 (物品 in the filter must be renamed with tag names, like 'forge:stone'
jei.pedestals.filter_tag_machine.interac: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
§5 This Filter Filters Similar to an 物品Stack Filter
§3 副手 Filter and Right Click in Air to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click in Air to switch MODES, 潜行 Right Clicking a block when in the offhand adds/removes it from the filter.
§5 This Filter Filters Similar to an 物品 Filter
§3 副手 Filter and Right Click in Air to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click in Air to switch MODES, 潜行 Right Clicking a block when in the offhand adds/removes it from the filter.

jei.pedestals.filter_itemstack_machine.i: §3 副手 Filter and Right Click to switch TYPES, 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
jei.pedestals.workcard_area.description: §5 潜行右击两点选择工作区域，潜行右击空气以清除选择
jei.pedestals.workcard_locations.descrip: §5 单击以设置卡片，潜行右击空气以清除选择
jei.pedestals.workcard_pedestals.descrip: §5 单击以设置卡片， 潜行右击空气以清除选择

jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_item.de: Stores a lot of the same 物品堆叠, Will Discharge the Stacks after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_fluid.d: Stores a lot of 流体, Will Discharge the 流体 after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
Stores a lot of 能量, Will Discharge the 能量after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_xp.desc: Stores a lot of 经验, Will Discharge the 经验after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
jei.pedestals.mechanical_storage_dust.de: Stores a lot of 粉尘, Will Discharge the 粉尘after a short duration if held by a living entity/player.
item.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.bas: THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.base: §5THIS UPGRADE BASE IS JUST A CRAFTING COMPONENT!!!
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_base.desc: §5All Other 升级: 副手 升级 and 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES, 副手 升级 and Right Click to Insert Into Pedestal
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_magnet.de: §5'Magnets' up items in the selected work area.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_magnet.in: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define magnet area.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_void.inte: §3副手 升级 and 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES
§5Waits till the Pedestal is Full of 流体/能量/经验/粉尘and then Packages it up into an 物品.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_unpackage: §5Takes Packages and Un-Packages them into the pedestals buffer.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_crafter.d: §5Crafts 物品 Like a vanilla crafter. Bind pedestals to the Pedestal Locations Card, the bound order matters! insert upgrade into pedestal, and insert crafting items in order
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_crafter.i: §3Uses Pedestal Locations (Card) to define selected pedestals which are used as the crafting tables slots.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_bottler.d: §5Bottles/Fills 物品 with 流体/能量/Exp/粉尘
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_bottler.i: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_unbottler: §5UnBottles/Drains 物品 with 流体/能量/Exp/粉尘
§3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fluidconv: §5Converts 流体 into 物品/能量/Exp/粉尘
§3流体 from the Pedestals Inventory will be consumed for this process.
§3副手 升级 and 潜行 Right Click to switch MODES. Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smelter.d: §5Smelts 物品 like a Vanilla Furnace Does
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smelter.i: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smoker.de: §5Smelts 物品 like a Vanilla Smoker Does
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_smoker.in: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_blaster.d: §5Smelts 物品 like a Vanilla Blast Furnace Does
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_blaster.i: §3Requires a Chest below the Pedestal for Inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_generator: §5Burns Vanilla Furnace Fuels for RF Production
§3Requires Fuel to be put into the pedestal.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breaker.d: §5'Breaks Blocks in the selected work area. Uses a Stone Pickaxe by default
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breaker.i: §3Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_placer.de: §5Places Non-Crop Blocks from the pedestal inventory into the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_placer.in: §3Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_filler.de: §5Rapidly Places Non-Crop Blocks from the pedestal inventory into the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_filler.in: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you select a 1 high area itll quarry from bedrock to world height, otherwise it'll clear out the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_quarry.de: §5'快速破坏选定工作区域中的方块，从基岩层到世界最高点。默认情况下使用铁镐。
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_quarry.in: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you select a 1 high area itll quarry from bedrock to world height, otherwise it'll clear out the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_chopper.d: §5'在选定的工作区域中砍伐木材/蘑菇/树叶方块。默认情况下使用铁斧。
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_chopper.i: §3使用区域（卡片）来定义其操作的区域。
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_pump.desc: §5'Rapidly Pumps fluid source blocks in the selected work area, from bedrock to world height. Uses a Iron Pickaxe by default.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_pump.inte: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you select a 1 high area itll quarry from bedrock to world height, otherwise it'll clear out the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_drain.des: §5'快速将基座容器中的流体源方块放置到选定的工作区域，从基岩到世界最高点。默认情况下使用铁镐。
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_drain.int: §3Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates. If you select a 1x1 square that is waterlogged, itll act like an infinite water source. If you select a 1 high Work 区域 itll quarry from bedrock to world height, otherwise it'll clear out the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_harvester: §5Breaks Fully Grown Crops. Uses a Stone Hoe by default.
§3Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_planter.d: §5Places Crop Blocks/Seeds from the pedestal inventory into the selected area
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_planter.i: §3Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fertilize: §5Grows Crops in the selected area. Doesnt require bonemeal, but using bonemeal from the pedestals inventory will greatly hasten crop growth.
§3Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_hiveharve: §5Harvests selected beehive blocks. Uses Sheers by default. Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to harvest the hive with those items instead.(Like Glass Bottles)
§Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_sheerer.d: §5Shears Animals in the selected area. Uses Shears by default. Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to shear with those items instead.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_sheerer.i: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_milker.de: §5Milks Animals in the selected area. Uses a Bucket by default.(Will attempt to put the fluid in the pedestal if its a valid fluid, otherwise itll do nothing) Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to milk with those items instead.(Like Bowls)
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_milker.in: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breeder.d: §5Breeds Animals in the selected area. Placing items in the pedestal will allow the upgrade to attempt to breed with those items.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_breeder.i: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
§5Kills Entities in the selected area. Inserted Weapons will buff the attack damage and use the enchants. Uses a Stick as a Weapon by Default
§Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates. Placing a block below this pedestal can change what Mob is targeted. (All possible options in JEI 'Mob Filters')
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fan.descr: §5Moves Entities in the selected area. Direction of Movement based on Pedestals Placement Direction
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_fan.inter: §3Uses Work 区域 (Card) to define the area in which it operates. Placing a block below this pedestal can change what Mob is targeted. (All possible options in JEI 'Mob Filters')
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_modificat: §5Infuses modifications into upgrades to enhance them. Bind pedestals to the upgrade, the bound order matters! insert upgrade into pedestal on top of chest, and insert infusion items in order (upgrade goes in below chest)
§3Uses Pedestal Locations (Card) to define the pedestals used for its crafting 'grid' inputs.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_dropper.d: §5'Drops' or Spawns in 物品/经验/能量in world in the selected locations/areas
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_dropper.i: §3'Uses either Work 区域 (Card) or Work Locations (Card) to define the area in which it operates.
jei.pedestals.upgrade_pedestal_cobblegen: §5基于基座下方方块和插入工具，将生成物品输入基座。
jei.pedestals.block_pedestal.description: §5可以传输物品，流体，能量，和-可以用染料重新染色
death.attack.pedestal5: %1$s 生命被一股神秘的力量夺走
death.attack.pedestal8: %1$s 的刀子因为没有好好拿着而滑下来了
death.attack.pedestal12: %1$s, 我们告诉过你不要玩尖锐的东西！
death.attack.pedestal13: %1$s, 被穿了多个洞，然后升天了。
death.attack.pedestal5.item: %1$s 生命被一股神秘的力量夺走
death.attack.pedestal8.item: %1$s 的刀子因为没有好好拿着而滑下来了
death.attack.pedestal12.item: %1$s, 我们告诉过你不要玩尖锐的东西！
death.attack.pedestal13.item: %1$s, 被穿了多个洞，然后升天了。
pedestal.book.name: 基座指南（非常在制品）
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.base: 这是所有升级的基础制作物品
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.attacker: 将在定义的工作区域执行模拟玩家攻击
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.import: 将物品/流体/能量/经验从下方容器导入基座。
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.export: 将物品/流体/能量/经验从基座导出到下方容器。
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.bottler: 默认情况下，从基座下方的容器中取出物品，"瓶子" 流体和经验，但也可以与能量和粉尘容器一起使用。
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.unbottler: 从基座下方的容器中取出物品， "拆瓶" 流体和经验，但也可以与能量和粉尘容器一起使用。
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.blaster: 像高炉一样起作用，将使用以下容器中的物品
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.breaker: 粉碎物品在工作区域或工作地点
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.crafter: 根据所选基座中的物品合成物品
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.smelter: 从下面的容器中供应的物品
pedestal.book.upgrades.desc.smoker: 从下面的容器中供应的物品
pedestal.book.work.category.name: 工作卡
pedestal.book.work.category.desc: 本节显示了定义基座升级的操作工作区域的卡片
pedestal.book.work.desc.area: 允许您确定基座工作的区域
pedestal.book.work.desc.location: 允许您设置基座工作的位置
pedestal.book.work.desc.pedestals: 基座设置操作中使用的基座
pedestal.book.augm.category.name: 增强
pedestal.book.augm.category.desc: 本节介绍了基座的工作原理
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t1capacity: 传输速率$(2br)$(li)增加传输速率s$$(li)物品: 4$(li)流体: 2000mb$(li)能量: 5000 Fe/t$(li)经验- 1级$(li)粉尘速率: 10$(li)最大升级: 4
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t2capacity: 传输速率$(2br)$(li)增加传输速率s$$(li)物品: 16$(li)流体: 4000mb$(li)能量: 10000 Fe/t$(li)经验- 5级s$(li)粉尘速率: 10$(li)最大升级: 8
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t3capacity: 传输速率$(2br)$(li)增加传输速率s$$(li)物品: 32$(li)流体: 8000mb$(li)能量: 100000 Fe/t$(li)经验- 10级s$(li)粉尘速率: 10$(li)最大升级: 12
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t4capacity: 传输速率$(2br)$(li)增加传输速率s$$(li)物品: 64$(li)流体: 16000mb$(li)能量: 1000000 Fe/t$(li)经验- 14级s$(li)粉尘速率: 10$(li)最大升级: 16
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t1speed: 减少每个传输操作之间的时间$(2br)$(li)游戏刻减少：2$(li)最大允许：5
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t2speed: 减少每个传输操作之间的时间$(2br)$(li)游戏刻减少：4$(li)最大允许：5
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t3speed: 减少每个传输操作之间的时间$(2br)$(li)游戏刻减少：6$(li)最大允许：5
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t4speed: 减少每个传输操作之间的时间$(2br)$(li)游戏刻减少：8$(li)最大允许：5
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t1range: 增加连接基座的距离$(2br)$(li)增加范围：2方块$(li)最大允许：4
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t2range: 增加连接基座的距离$(2br)$(li)增加范围：6方块$(li)最大允许：4
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t3range: 增加连接基座的距离$(2br)$(li)增加范围：8方块$(li)最大允许：5
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t4range: 增加连接基座的距离$(2br)$(li)增加范围：8方块$(li)最大允许：7
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t1storage: 增加基座的存储容量$(2br)$(li)堆叠： 1$(li)流体: 4,000Mb$(li)能量: 20,000Fe$(li)经验等级： 10$(li)粉尘速率: 50$(li)最大允许 3
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t2storage: 增加基座的存储容量$(2br)$(li)堆叠： 1$(li)流体: 16,000Mb$(li)能量: 100,000Fe$(li)经验等级： 15$(li)粉尘速率: 100$(li)最大允许 7
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t3storage: 增加基座的存储容量$(2br)$(li)堆叠： 1$(li)流体: 64,000Mb$(li)能量: 1,000,000Fe$(li)经验等级： 20$(li)粉尘速率: 200$(li)最大允许 11
pedestal.book.augm.desc.t4storage: 增加基座的存储容量$(2br)$(li)堆叠： 1$(li)流体: 256,000Mb$(li)能量: 10,000,000Fe$(li)经验等级： 25$(li)粉尘速率: 500$(li)最大允许 15
pedestal.book.augm.crft.roundrobin: 要制作，请在鹦鹉附近放一张纸，然后用任何连接工具右击
pedestal.book.augm.desc.roundrobin: 按照与最后一个连接的顺序进行基座传输。 如果基座无法发送到另一个基座，它将移至下一个基座
pedestal.book.augm.crft.renderdiffuser: To craft, right click on a piece of paper with a linking wand when its raining outside
pedestal.book.augm.desc.renderdiffuser: Makes the pedestal tranasfer in order of the first linked to its last. If the pedestal cannot send to another pedestal, it will move to the next one
pedestal.book.augm.crft.collide: To craft, right click on a piece of paper when paper collides with an animal
pedestal.book.augm.desc.collide: Makes the pedestal tranasfer in order of the first linked to its last. If the pedestal cannot send to another pedestal, it will move to the next one
